controller

Class ScoreController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ScoreController

  • public class ScoreController
extends java.lang.Object
    ScoreController class handles the scores implementation. Reads and Writes to a Text file. Sorts the scores. Stores the top 5 scores.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScoreController

        public ScoreController()
        ScoreController() is a Default Constructor. Initializes the length of the scores list. Reads the text file.

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        public void readFile()
        readFile() is Method that reads the text file and stores the values to local array.

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile()
        writeFile is a Method that writes the local array value into the text file.

      • sortScores

        public void sortScores()
        sortScores() Method, sorts the scores in descending order of:
        • Total number of Bricks Broken
        • Minutes taken
        • Seconds taken

      • playerNameDialogBox

        public java.lang.String playerNameDialogBox()
        playerNameDialogBox is a Method that launches a JOptionPane to ask the user to input their name. Launches when user sets a new high-score.
        Returns:
        returns player name entered by user.

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Getter method to access the value of the private length variable.
        Returns:
        returns the length of the scores list.

      • setLength

        public void setLength(int length)
        Setter method to set the length of the scores list. Ensures length value does not exceed past 6.
        Parameters:
        length - returns the length variable value.
